A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't quite understand why nerds bash this one as if its the worst SW movies ever made (it's not...some of the prequels easily win that ignominy) -- and let's face it\, if you view the first 3\, every movie after it is based on some central light vs. dark and mini-plots of ancillary characters\, whether its Han Solo's adventures in the first two or Finn & Rose (in this one). Formulaic? yeah\, but we still enjoy it & this one brought it home for me since its the last we will see of Lea and Luke triumphantly sign off & peace out (sad!) -- whats more interesting now is how the new generation will pick up the legacy and keep us excited!
